content: अशुभ {%<ab>a.</ab>%} {@--1@} Inauspicious. {@--2@} Impure, dirty, foul (<ab>opp.</ab> शुभ); शुभेनाशुभेन वोपायेन <ls>K. 158</ls> by any means, fair or foul. {@--3@} Unlucky, unfortunate. --भं {@--1@} Inauspiciousness. {@--2@} Sin, a shameful deed. {@--3@} Misfortune, calamity; नाथे कुतस्त्वय्यशुभं प्रजानां <ls>R. 5. 13</ls>; प्रायः शुभं विदधात्यशुभं च जंतोः <ls>Māl. 1. 23.</ls>
